title: StudyNotion – Full-Stack EdTech Platform
description: A complete MERN-based EdTech platform enabling instructors to create and monetize courses while students can browse, purchase, and track learning progress. Features secure authentication, Razorpay payments, cloud media storage, and analytics dashboards.

title: TrueFeedback – Anonymous Feedback Platform
description: A privacy-focused Next.js application that allows users to receive honest, anonymous feedback via shareable links. Includes dual authentication, AI-powered feedback prompts using Google Gemini, email notifications, and a responsive dashboard.

title: Droply – Cloud File Storage App
description: A Dropbox-inspired cloud storage web app built with Next.js and TypeScript. Supports file uploads, folder navigation, starring, trash management, optimized media delivery, and authentication using Clerk.

title: Codyssey – Coding Practice Platform
description: A LeetCode-inspired coding platform featuring a Monaco-based code editor, multi-language support, real-time execution using Judge0 API, submission tracking, and an admin panel for managing problems.

title: MusicApp – Next.js Learning Platform
description: A modern music learning platform built with Next.js 15 and Tailwind CSS, featuring curated courses, instructor profiles, testimonials, webinars, and smooth UI animations using Aceternity and shadcn/ui.

title: De Core – Handcrafted Art Showcase
description: A visually rich showcase website for handcrafted art products featuring animated sections, 3D assets with Spline, responsive layouts, and modern UI patterns built using Next.js App Router.
